short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organizes tabs into groups using AI with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Tab Organizer is a powerful Chrome extension that uses AI to intelligently categorize and group your open tabs. With just one click, it analyzes your tabs' content and organizes them into logical groups, helping you maintain a clutter-free browsing experience and improve your productivity.

Key features:
- AI-powered tab classification
- Automatic creation of tab groups
- Option to preserve existing tab groups
- Custom grouping instructions support
- Quick ungroup function for all tabs
- Simple and intuitive user interface

How it works:
1. Click the extension icon to open the interface
2. Click "Organize Tabs" to start the process
3. The AI analyzes your open tabs and creates logical groups

The extension offers flexibility in how you organize your tabs:
- Add custom instructions like "group by domain" or "group by topic"
- Keep existing groups while organizing new tabs
- Quickly remove all groups with one click
- Monitor the organization progress with status updates
